    <metadata>

      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lom.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:aspect.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_67c852d0d0dcc9eebdeec6eee62b435822edf4f5</entry>
          </identifier>

            <catalog>CUP</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_67c852d0d0dcc9eebdeec6eee62b435822edf4f5</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">How shadows are created</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wie Schatten hergestellt werden</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Comment des ombres sont créées</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Como as sombras são criadas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Come le ombre sono create</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πώς οι σκιές δημιουργούνται</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Cómo se crean las sombras</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows that light coming from a single point produces sharp shadows while light coming from different points will cast a shadow with blurred edges.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">light</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">light source</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">shadow</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">sharp shadow</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, daß das Licht, das von 
einem einzelnen Punkt kommt, scharfe Schatten produziert, während das
Licht, das von den unterschiedlichen Punkten kommt, einen Schatten mit
unscharfen Rändern wirft.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration prouve que la lumière venant 
d'un seul point produit les ombres pointues tandis que la lumière 
venant de différents points moulera une ombre avec les bords 
brouillés.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra que a luz que vem de um 
único ponto produz sombras afiadas quando a luz que vem dos pontos 
diferentes moldará uma sombra com bordas borradas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione indica che la luce che viene
da un singolo punto produce le ombre taglienti mentre la luce che 
viene dai punti differenti lancerà un'ombra con i bordi vaghi.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση δείχνει ότι το φως που προέρχεται 
από ένα ενιαίο σημείο παράγει τις αιχμηρές σκιές ενώ το φως 
που προέρχεται από τα διαφορετικά σημεία θα πετάξει μια σκιά με 
τις θολωμένες άκρες.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra que la luz que viene de
una sola punta produce sombras sostenidas mientras que la luz que 
viene de diversas puntas echará una sombra con los bordes 
enmascarados.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Licht</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lichtquelle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Schatten</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">scharfer Schatten</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">lumière</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">source lumineuse</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">ombre</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">ombre pointue</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">luz</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">sombra</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">sombra afiada</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">ombra</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">ombra tagliente</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">φως</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">σκιά</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">αιχμηρή σκιά</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">sombra</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
